StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: A focused professional offering 1 + years of experience in Business Analysis, Data Analysis, Big Data Analytics, Business Consulting, Regression Analysis, Customer Segmentation, Dashboard Generation, User Stories, MS Excel, R, Python, Tableau, Hive, Spark, GCP, HDFS, YARN, SQL..

EmployerOrg.EmployerOrgName: Tredence Analytics Services and Solutions Company

PositionHistory.Title: Business Analyst - Data Analysis

OrgName.OrganizationName: Tredence Analytics Services and Solutions Company

PositionHistory.Description:
Performed customer segmentation and profiling (One Time Shoppers vs Repeat Shoppers as well as High/Medium/Low valued). Identified customer pre-purchase browsing behavior to assist the marketing team to target potential High Value Repeat customers. Worked on measuring various campaign effectiveness by measuring conversions through campaigns based on 3-day last touch method. Analyzed conversions through various marketing vehicles within category and cross category. Performed Sequential Analysis on a combination of categories to find their order of purchase in a Customer life cycle. Worked on data warehousing for a campaign performance dashboard for Email campaigns and push notifications. Worked on classification of campaigns into various segments to see high and low performing segments. Worked on optimizing existing data pipelines for existing production dashboard. Worked on scheduling of jobs and automating data pipelines using shell scripting. Also added various quality check points in the data pipelines for smooth functioning and detection of errors. Worked on migration of data pipelines from on premise clusters to Google Cloud Platform and Big Query. Maintained a production Tableau Dashboard and also made various changes to it when required
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 240021345280a5400134f17425c4c6&sid=3810263223&AT=1580666737 2/2/20 19'07
Automated a process for Daily reporting of various KPI's using R and Excel.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 51% of this job
